headline: Vertex Pharma CEO Buys the Stock Dip
summary: Biotech Vertex Pharmaceuticals stock tumbled on news of disappointing drug data. CEO Reshma Kewalramani paid nearly $4 million to buy shares.

raw.headline: Vertex Pharma CEO Buys the Stock Dip

headline: Is This Beaten-Down Stock a Buy on the Dip?
summary: It's the second time this year the stock has slumped significantly in one day, and it might represent another attractive entry point.
